body_content.explanation: relating to or typical of communism (= the belief in a society without different social classes, and in which the methods of production are owned and controlled by all its members):
examples: His opponents accused him of pushing the country towards a more communistic style of government.
This regulation is in my view unconstitutional, if not communistic.
William Morris began the Arts and Crafts Movement based on his vision of a world in which each person would be liberated through a sort of communistic, crafts-based economy.
